ops.description: showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “Please go to the counter.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:3}); // “No charge for a smile…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:10}); // “Look, why not forget about Meteor and Weapon
for now and do a little impulse shopping!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:11}); // “Why don't you surround yourself with young girls
and have some fun…maybe for the last time.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:9}); // “I hired more girls after hearing
that the world's coming to an end,
but I wonder if I should have.”{PAUSE}“I keep getting more and more in debt.
I've got to get out from under it somehow.
Maybe I'll have Weapon help me.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:7}); // “There're lots of stores in Junon.”{PAUSE}“If we don't do this…we can't compete.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:8}); // “But, what bothers me is that
the girls make more than me.”

dialogStrings: “There're lots of stores in Junon.”{PAUSE}“If we don't do this…we can't compete.”

“But, what bothers me is that
the girls make more than me.”

“I hired more girls after hearing
that the world's coming to an end,
but I wonder if I should have.”{PAUSE}“I keep getting more and more in debt.
I've got to get out from under it somehow.
Maybe I'll have Weapon help me.”

“Look, why not forget about Meteor and Weapon
for now and do a little impulse shopping!?”

“Why don't you surround yourself with young girls
and have some fun…maybe for the last time.”
